law.catch_line: The free and reduced price breakfast program under this subtitle shall be suspended if the per meal ...

text.section:
The free and reduced price breakfast program under this subtitle shall be suspended if the per meal reimbursement that the federal government provides for the breakfast program is:
Reduced below the rate prescribed on July 1, 1979; or
Adjusted by the Secretary of the United States Department of Agriculture, as of the most recent July 1 under the national Child Nutrition Act, and the per meal reimbursement is below the adjusted rate.

The reimbursement for each meal under subsection (a) of this section shall be determined as follows:
Multiply the number of reduced price breakfasts served statewide times the federal reimbursement rate for those breakfasts;
Multiply the number of free breakfasts served statewide times the federal reimbursement rate for those breakfasts; and
Divide the total of paragraphs (1) and (2) of this subsection by the total number of free and reduced price breakfasts.
